snippet.title: CD2: TrapMaster First Trailer
snippet.description:
First Teaser Reveal!
CD2: TrapMaster is a Unique Fusion of deckbuilding Roguelike + Trap-style Tower defense game. Try the Demo on Itch!

Instead of placing traps on the map, players now draw cards🃏. 
Trap cards can be placed on the map to stop enemies👾.
Skill cards can buff traps or debuff enemies💪.
Power cards can add some interesting mechanism to the map🎆. 

Players will travel on a world map similar to Slay the Spire, building their deck along the way and facing a boss at the end of the journey.

Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2330870/CD2/?utm_source=YouTube
Try the Demo on Itch:
http://gamewithace.itch.io/cd2trapmaster
